articles.author: Frank Pallotta, CNN Business
articles.title: 'Black Widow' is a big hit in theaters and on Disney+ - CNN
articles.description: "Black Widow," the latest film from Disney's blockbuster Marvel Studios, brought in an estimated $80 million in its North America opening this weekend. That was around what the industry was expecting and was also a record for the pandemic era.

articles.author: Sport360 staff
articles.title: Barcelona legend Lionel Messi ends long wait for Copa America glory with Argentina - Sport360
articles.description:
Barcelona icon Lionel Messi’s long wait for a first international trophy was ended when Angel Di Maria got the only goal as Argentina defeated hosts Brazil in the Copa America final.
Di Maria, 33, latched onto Rodrigo De Paul’s searching through ball and eleg…

articles.description: England face Italy in the Euro 2020 final on July 11 as the month-long international tournament comes to a close - but who will be the referee in charge of the contest?

articles.title: Is Messi now the greatest ever? Argentine silences critics with Copa America win - ITV News
articles.description: Lionel Messi hasn't won a trophy with Argentina - but the 16-year wait is now over.
articles.content:
Lionel Messis long wait for a major trophy with Argentina is over after a 1-0 win against Brazil in the Copa America final.
The 34-year-old, currently a free agent after his contract at Barcelona ex… [+2575 chars]

articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar Congratulates Lionel Messi, Argentina On "Historic" Copa America Win - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: Sachin Tendulkar took to Twitter to congratulate Lionel Messi and Argentina on their Copa America win, and also tweeted some comforting words for Neymar and Brazil.
articles.content: Sachin Tendulkar on Sunday congratulated Lionel Messi and his national football team Argentina on winning the Copa America final against Brazil. In a tweet, the former India cricketer called the win … [+2433 chars]

articles.description: Much-awaited return bout ends with career-threatening injury as Irish superstar rages and American wins by TKO.
articles.content:
Dustin Poirier beat Conor McGregor for the second time in six months when McGregor badly injured his left ankle in the closing seconds of the first round at UFC 264 on Saturday night (Sunday NZT).
